Give me 10 free lead magnet ideas I could use to attract people to this course

Sure, here are 10 free lead magnet ideas that you could use to attract people to your digital art course:

1. Digital art cheat sheet: This lead magnet could include helpful tips and tricks for creating high-quality digital art products.
2. Digital art resources list: Share your go-to resources for digital art creation and promotion, including websites, tools, and software.
3. Digital art templates: Offer free templates for creating popular digital art products like social media graphics, printables, or wallpapers.
4. Digital art tutorials: Share bite-sized video tutorials on various digital art techniques or software tools.
5. Digital art inspiration guide: Offer a free guide filled with digital art inspiration and ideas to help your audience jumpstart their creativity.
6. Digital art challenge: Challenge your audience to create and share a specific digital art project, with the chance to win a prize.
7. Digital art community access: Give your audience access to a private community of digital art creators, where they can network and get feedback on their work.
8. Digital art critique session: Offer a free critique session where your audience can submit their digital art for feedback from you or a group of experts.
9. Digital art Q&A session: Host a free Q&A session where your audience can ask you anything about digital art creation and promotion.
10. Digital art product giveaway: Offer a free digital art product, like a printable or desktop wallpaper, to everyone who signs up for your email list.
